chart.title: Alcohol and drug use disorders death rate
chart.subtitle: Estimated annual number of deaths from alcohol and [drug use disorders](#dod:drug_use_disorder) per 100,000 people. These include only direct deaths from these disorders, meaning they do not include suicide deaths which can in some cases be connected or attributed to them.
